description: Fired when an error occurs in the character builder system during concept creation or processing.

payloadSchema.title: Core: Character Builder Error Occurred Event Payload
payloadSchema.description: Defines the payload structure for the 'core:character_builder_error_occurred' event, used for reporting character builder specific errors.

error.description: Required. A detailed error message describing what went wrong.

operation.description: Required. The character builder operation that failed.

concept.description: Optional. A truncated version of the character concept that was being processed.

attempts.description: Optional. Number of attempts made before the operation failed.

finalError.description: Optional. The final error message from the last attempt.

conceptId.description: Optional. The UUID of the character concept involved in the error.

timestamp.description: Optional. ISO 8601 timestamp of when the error occurred.
